com.vaadin.fluent.api

Interface FluentAbstractColorPicker<THIS extends FluentAbstractColorPicker<THIS>>

  • Type Parameters:
    THIS - Self-referential generic THIS
    All Superinterfaces:
    com.vaadin.server.ClientConnector, com.vaadin.ui.Component, com.vaadin.ui.Component.Focusable, com.vaadin.shared.Connector, com.vaadin.event.ContextClickEvent.ContextClickNotifier, FluentAbstractComponent<THIS>, FluentAbstractField<THIS,com.vaadin.shared.ui.colorpicker.Color>, FluentClientConnector<THIS>, FluentComponent<THIS>, FluentComponent.FluentFocusable<THIS>, FluentContextClickNotifier<THIS>, FluentHasValue<THIS,com.vaadin.shared.ui.colorpicker.Color>, FluentSizeable<THIS>, com.vaadin.data.HasValue<com.vaadin.shared.ui.colorpicker.Color>, Serializable, com.vaadin.server.Sizeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FColorPicker, FColorPickerArea

    public interface FluentAbstractColorPicker<THIS extends FluentAbstractColorPicker<THIS>>
extends FluentAbstractField<THIS,com.vaadin.shared.ui.colorpicker.Color>
    The base interface for fluent versions of AbstractColorPicker

    AbstractColorPicker

    • Method Detail

      • withDefaultCaptionEnabled

        default THIS withDefaultCaptionEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Set true if the component should show a default caption (css-code for the currently selected color, e.g. #ffffff) when no other caption is available.
        Parameters:
        enabled - true to enable the default caption, false to disable
        Returns:
        this for method chaining
        See Also:
        AbstractColorPicker.setDefaultCaptionEnabled(boolean)

      • withHistoryVisibility

        default THIS withHistoryVisibility(boolean visible)
        Sets the visibility of the color history, displaying recently picked colors.
        Parameters:
        visible - true to display the history, false to hide it
        Returns:
        this for method chaining
        See Also:
        AbstractColorPicker.setHistoryVisibility(boolean)

      • withHSVVisibility

        default THIS withHSVVisibility(boolean visible)
        Sets the visibility of the HSV Tab.
        Parameters:
        visible - true to display the HSV tab, false to hide it
        Returns:
        this for method chaining
        See Also:
        AbstractColorPicker.setHSVVisibility(boolean)

        this for method chaining
